timeline.bodyText: Enum is now good for extension, because you have to change the source codes. Please consider this as an abstract type.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Should not have ModuleStartException, this is not a module
replies.author: wu-sheng
arugal

timeline.bodyText: Seems you did not override the hashCode and equals methods in OALDefine and its subclasses
timeline.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText:
Default, hash* uses the object ID, so, this only works for the same object, rather than the same OAL.
This should be fixed.
BTW, I am considering to enhance this later, merging the content rather than the file only. But this is totally another story.
replies.author: wu-sheng
